description.full: This is the football game for real football-lovers. The first release of Pro Evolution Soccer series for the Xbox 360 platform. New animation, motion and graphics developed for the Xbox 360 version to realise the "beautiful game" at home. Improved gameplay makes you feel that you are playing a part in your favourite team on the pitch. Whenever you want to challenge someone stronger, Take it online with Xbox Live and play! Your evolution never ends.
